name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond: ( ( t1.`ASSIGNEDBY` =  ${srfsessioncontext('srfloginname','{"defname":"ASSIGNEDBY","dename":"ZT_TODO"}')}  OR  t1.`FINISHEDBY` =  ${srfsessioncontext('srfloginname','{"defname":"FINISHEDBY","dename":"ZT_TODO"}')}  OR  t1.`UPDATEBY` =  ${srfsessioncontext('srfloginname','{"defname":"UPDATEBY","dename":"ZT_TODO"}')}  OR  t1.`CLOSEDBY` =  ${srfsessioncontext('srfloginname','{"defname":"CLOSEDBY","dename":"ZT_TODO"}')}  OR  t1.`ACCOUNT` =  ${srfsessioncontext('srfloginname','{"defname":"ACCOUNT","dename":"ZT_TODO"}')} ) )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (case when t1.`DATE` = '2030-01-01' then '待定' else t1.`DATE` end)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: DATE1

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`ACCOUNT`,
t1.`ASSIGNEDBY`,
t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`,
t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`,
t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`,
t1.`BEGIN`,
t1.`CLOSEDBY`,
t1.`CLOSEDDATE`,
t1.`CONFIG`,
t1.`COST`,
t1.`CYCLE`,
t1.`DATE`,
(case when t1.`DATE` = '2030-01-01' then '待定' else t1.`DATE` end) AS `DATE1`,
t1.`DEPT`,
t1.`DEPTNAME`,
t1.`END`,
t1.`FINISHEDBY`,
t1.`FINISHEDDATE`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`IDVALUE`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`ORG`,
t1.`ORGNAME`,
t1.`PRI`,
t1.`PRIVATE`,
t1.`STATUS`,
t1.`TODOSN`,
t1.`TYPE`,
t1.`UPDATEBY`
FROM `zt_todo` t1
